reviewText:
This is a wonderful Christian show for children. The puppets are precious and Mr. Quigley is like a Mr. Rogers.
I highly recommend!

I like this DVD because it practically teaches children about obedience to God. It actually deals with real situations that children face.  My children used to love Quigley's Village and now my grandson is loving it too.

Grew up watching this movie - it's a great, wholesome, childrens movie with good learning principles.  As an adult, it definitely appeared cheesier than I remember - but what kids movie isn't? I never noticed those things when I was a little one :)  definite must-have to the collection.
